channel.title: AWS IAM Release Notes
channel.description: Document history for the AWS IAM User Guide.

item.title: Support for Amazon VPC endpoints
item.description: You can now establish a private connection between your VPC and AWS STS in the US West (Oregon) Region.

item.title: Delegated administrator
item.description: New feature makes it easier to grant trusted employees the ability to manage IAM permissions without also granting full IAM administrative access.

item.title: aws:PrincipalOrgID
item.description: New condition key provides an easier way to control access to AWS resources by specifying the AWS organization of IAM principals.

item.title: aws:RequestedRegion
item.description: New condition key provides an easier way to use IAM policies to control access to AWS Regions.

item.title: Increased session duration for IAM roles
item.description: An IAM role can now have a session duration of 12 hours.

item.title: Updated role-creation workflow
item.description: New workflow improves the process of creating trust relationships and attaching permissions to roles.

item.title: AWS account sign-in process
item.description: Updated AWS sign-in experience allows both root users and IAM users to use the Sign In to the Console link on the AWS Management Console's home page.

item.title: Example IAM policies
item.description: Documentation update features more than 30 example policies.

item.title: IAM best practices
item.description: Information added to the Users section of the IAM console makes it easier to follow IAM best practices.

item.title: Auto Scaling resources
item.description: Resource-level permissions can control access to and permissions for Auto Scaling resources.

item.title: Amazon RDS for MySQL and Amazon Aurora databases
item.description: Database administrators can associate database users with IAM users and roles and thus manage user access to all AWS resources from a single location.

item.title: Service-linked roles
item.description: Service-linked roles provide an easier and more secure way to delegate permissions to AWS services.

item.title: Policy summaries
item.description: New policy summaries make it easier to understand permissions in IAM policies.
